pr_title: Added JUnit tests for Metatype package - part1

timeline.bodyText:
While using assertEquals, assertNotEquals (and so on) they al support a message linked to the assert* as a first argument. It is a good practice to add a message that shows which specific assert has failed.
So in this case:
assertEquals("tocd.id", "49", emptyTocd.getId());
would make any failure linked to a meaningful message which can avoid to have to look at the code to check what has failed.
timeline.author: Coduz
